name: merge fields
desc: Combine the input fields from up to 4 separate inputs into a unified single field with any number of nodal data components.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Merge Cell Sets When Possible
properties.desc: If all input fields have matching cell set types and names, automatically merge them in output.

properties.name: Nodal Data From Field 1
properties.desc: The Nodal Data From Field1 that should be included in the output.  Be sure that the order of the components is identical from each input.

properties.name: Cell Data From Field 1
properties.desc: The Cell Data From Field1 that should be included in the output.  Be sure that the order of the components is identical from each input.

properties.name: Nodal Data From Field 2
properties.desc: The Nodal Data From Field2 that should be included in the output.  Be sure that the order of the components is identical from each input.

properties.name: Cell Data From Field 2
properties.desc: The Cell Data From Field2 that should be included in the output.  Be sure that the order of the components is identical from each input.

properties.name: Nodal Data From Field 3
properties.desc: The Nodal Data From Field3 that should be included in the output.  Be sure that the order of the components is identical from each input.

properties.name: Cell Data From Field 3
properties.desc: The Cell Data From Field3 that should be included in the output.  Be sure that the order of the components is identical from each input.

properties.name: Nodal Data From Field 4
properties.desc: The Nodal Data From Field4 that should be included in the output.  Be sure that the order of the components is identical from each input.

properties.name: Cell Data From Field 4
properties.desc: The Cell Data From Field4 that should be included in the output.  Be sure that the order of the components is identical from each input.
